name: Stump Simulator
description:
Stump Simulator is a game in which you can become a tree stump.

This game will give you a meditative gameplay. You can stand and contemplate the beauty of the forest around you living your life as a tree stump. You can also perform actions that tree sumps usually perform (stand in the same place).

Features

  • You're a tree stump
  • You're in the forest
  • There are other tree stumps around you
  • And not only tree stumps

Other Features

  • 2 game mods: arcade and realistic
  • Dynamic change of day and night
  • Beautiful stylized graphics
